title: Ivanti security advisory (AV25-270)
description: On May 13, 2025, Ivanti published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM)  version 11.12.0.4 and prior
Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM)  version 12.3.0.1 and prior
Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM)  version 12.4.0.1 and prior
Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM)  version 12.5.0.0 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
